Reviews.Title: “A fantastic hotel”
Reviews.Author: SirHugh34
Reviews.Content: Everything about this hotel is fine. The perfect choice for travelling with family

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: catalina_andra
Reviews.Content: We just arrived from Barcelona, amazing city. We stayed for 4 nights in this 3 stars hotel and if the rooms were a little bigger we could say it was a four star hotel. Amazing and nice staff from the front desk to the ones who made our room, changed towels every single day and those who served perfectly our breakfast. We were very impressed by the staff who are very friendly and helpfull. Our room was clean everyday, everything was changed from towels to bath foam and garbage removal. The hotel is in Eixample district, a couple of blocks away from Urgell metro station (Red Line L1) or bus 59 is closer and takes you to Catalunya, down to Rambla and to Pg. Maritime, station Barceloneta, to the beach. On down lows are smalls things who can be overall not taken in consideration, the heating system makes a little noise like all of this kind, the rooms are not very big but they are wonderful, the bath is very nice, cousy, marble. Nearby the hotel are some restaurants, Grocery and Fruit Shops, Supermarkets, but I strongly recommend Mercat de la Boqueria for a real taste of Barcelona. Thank you Century Park Hotel for a wonderful staying.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Century Park: good place for a visit to Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Ivan61Sofia_Bulgaria
Reviews.Content: I'd recommend this hotel, as chipper and with very good location. It is in Example district and it is is close to the metro and bus stations. Staff is very kindly. We didn't have a breakfast but nearby have got a nice cafe with excellent croissants and coffee. Rooms are small but there is free Wi Fi. I'd suggested for a diner a nice place: "La Rosi".

Reviews.Title: “HOTEL CENTURY PARK”
Reviews.Author: Deirdrebip
Reviews.Content: We loved Hotel Century Park Hotel because it gave a sense of the real Barcelona. The restaurants and bars were frequented by locals, prices were much cheaper, and speaking a little Spanish was a necessity at times. The hotel had good public transport links. The staff were very helpful and friendly. Rooms were very clean and perfectly adequate, good value for the price we paid. We went to visit the Sagrada Familia and the queues were extremely long. A helpful Security Guard explained that if we bought the tickets from the CAIXA we would be able to walk straight in without waiting. The ATM machine is situated inside the CAIXA and it was a simple process to book the tickets. Lots of other events can be booked this way to avoid wasting your holiday in long lines. Note: The hotel did not know that it was possible to book the tickets this way. We would definitely return to Hotel Century Park and to Barcelona. Dee

Reviews.Title: “A big disappointment!”
Reviews.Author: elenaciabuca
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Century Park hotel for one night in August after debarking from our cruise in Barcelona .At first the hotel looks very good ,the reception and the breakfast room catch your eye ,but when we saw our room we were very shocked.The room , the bed and the bathroom were veeery small! but the TV was a big plasma TV ironically .Also i have to say that the location was not so good also;the metro station is at 10 min walk .When I will return in Barcelona I would not choose this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable hotel with helpful, polite staff.”
Reviews.Author: mariaant
Reviews.Content: When we were dropped off to our hotel at 2am after a 2 hours journey from Girona airport, I was pleasantly surprised at how modern and new the reception area and restaurant/cafe was. The night receptionist was so helpful and polite. When we got to our room on the 5th floor i was a little taken aback at how small the room was. We had twin beds instead of a double which is what i had booked. The room was dated and the bathroom was a throwback to the 70's! However, the bed was comfortable and I slept like a baby each and every night. The room was clean and that was the main thing really. I dont think there were any other visitors on the 5th floor as it was quiet. The walls are quite thin so I expect it could get noisy. I was really pleased overall. There is free internet access in reception. The staff were so helpful and polite, the hotel wasn't too far from the nearest 2 metro stations, about a 10 minute walk. The only thing I would say is that there are no late night shops open nearby so if you want drinks or snacks for the room buy them early on in the day. I would definitely go back and would recommend to anyone who wants a simple, clean hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Thumbs up to this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Dhine
Reviews.Content: Great hotel, clean rooms, very friendly and helpfull staffs, more or less 15 mins walk to catalunya, basic breakfast buffet. We are very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: “Good basic hotel well located”
Reviews.Author: jackjohn30
Reviews.Content: Friendly and helpful staff with a nice breakfast. A good value for a basic room. location is a little out of the tourist core area which allows for a little more true regional culture. Everything is in easy walking distance. You have activate the electrical system in the room by putting the room key in the slot. Took a little while to figure that one out.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: taniutzzza
Reviews.Content: I booked the rooms in this hotel 6 months in advance so i had a very good rate 68 E/night per double room breakfast included. The hotel is 15 min walk from Ramblas so if you are used with long walks is good located. The pictures look very nice, but the rooms are basic and really little. The continental breakfast and the service are good. For this rate 68 E/night for double room with breakfast included i would recomand it, but not for more !!!!

Reviews.Title: “A very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: SirHugh34
Reviews.Content: Cheap, very clean and comfortable hotel. Close to transports and the city centrer. Simple but very good breakfast. A nice place to stay in Barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: sweety_g_bg
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very well located between Plaza Espania and Plaza Catalunia (15 min. walk). The metro is 10 min. walk. The breakfast is not varied - the tomatoes are the only vegetables and they count them :). Luggage room on the reception. PC with free internet available next to the reception (for 20 min.) Bring your valuables with you.

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel, good value for money”
Reviews.Author: DINA_greece18
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Century Park hotel for 6 days during June, with my boyfriend. We were a bit sceptical, mainly due to some negative reviews in this site. But we were pleasantly surprissed. The room was spacious and very clean. The breakfast was more than adequate and even though the lounge was small we always found a free table. The stuff was very hepfull and always willing to give us tips about the city. The only downside was that the hotel is on a rather busy street so you cant have the windows open during rush hours, its too noisy (but with windows closed the soundproofing is excellent). It is a bit far from Rambla and the centre of the city, but metro station in 3 blocks away, so no big deal. Overall it was a great value for money, and I would definatly reccomend it to someone with a tight budget.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing value!”
Reviews.Author: Billyjo25
Reviews.Content: We were somewhat anxious prior to our arrival at this hotel due mainly to the very reasonable rate as well as some negative feedback on this site. However we were agreeably surprised at the efficient way in which we were recieved and given some very helpful information on our arrival. The room was simply furnished but exceptionally clean. The free in-room safe was a bonus, considering the stories we had heard of pickpockets etc in Barcelona. The cold buffet breakfast was perfectly adequate and replenished regularly. Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “its OK!”
Reviews.Author: alexandragv
Reviews.Content: good location. good service But VERy noisy - walls're thin. we heard all sounds from other rooms!!!! 2 beds on wheels're not good for a couple. dut "Century" is good at all.

Reviews.Title: “BEWARE!!! THIEVES!!!”
Reviews.Author: Ana_Belle_9
Reviews.Content: THINK TWICE before you stay in this horrid hotel!!! You will thank me for it! On one hand there is the good location and the friendly staff. But on the other you get to have your personal belongings STOLEN and even if you complain, they do ABSOLUTELY NOTHING about it. Before we came to Barcelona me, my husband and two friends went to London for a few days. Because we're all fans of English cheese we bought 50£ worth of it, along with organic nuts and what not. And guess what? All of that was stolen from the room's fridge! How stupid is that??? Of course, this might look like a joke to some but what about the fact that our friends had all their money and their camera stolen from their room? Those of you who stayed in Century Park and weren't robbed have no idea how lucky you are. Not only that but my husband got mugged during our sight-seeing tour. Imagine that: admiring the absolutely stunning design of Antonio Gaudi's houses and suddenly realizing that OOPS! Your money and credit cards are missing! A word of advice: DO NOT use the underground. They only tell you that there is 24-hour surveillance but apparently they put the cameras there for decoration. The situation is so tragic that the ONLY WAY to avoid getting mugged in Barcelona and in Century Park Hotel in particular is to go there with nothing but the clothes on your back. Well, who knows, you'll probably have that stolen too... The thousands of gypsies in Barcelona probably have PhDs in ROBBING!

Reviews.Title: “Taxi Beware”
Reviews.Author: Mosdorset
Reviews.Content: Hotel ordered a taxi for airport run and advised us the cost would be about 26 euros.We had only hand luggage.The cost for the journey was 36 euros!

Reviews.Title: “A great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: GavinH
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel a total of 8 times in the last 2 years. I keep going back as the Facilites are good (I only require a basic, clean base), the staff could not be more helpful, and the hotel is in a great position. If you need a genuine "sensible" review of this hotel then please get in touch.

Reviews.Title: “Nice but noisy”
Reviews.Author: nascot
Reviews.Content: I spent 2 nights in the hotel during the week staying in a single room. The room was clean and tidy and all the furniture was in good condition. The bathroom was clean and in fully working order. A little pack next to the sink contained toothpaste, toothbrush, soap, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner. The breakfast area was small but clean and served the usual standard euro selection of cereal, cheese and cold meat. The only downside to the hotel was how little soundproofing my room had. I could hear people going up and down stairs and shutting doors etc although some of this has to do with fellow guests lack of consideration. The hotel location is futher from the train station (Sants) then the website suggests. They say 500m but I'd say it's closer to 1000m! It's a 15/20 min walk to the top of La Rambla. All in all it was a pleasent stay and I would recommend it for a 1 or 2 night stay.

Reviews.Title: “over-rated”
Reviews.Author: nztoeurope
Reviews.Content: As this Hotel is a 4 star, i was expecting just a little bit better than average. The reception staff were polite and friendly enough, but the rooms were in need of a refurbish. Breakfast was in a tiny room not big enough for all the guest that were staying, and the staff did'nt seem to know what they were doing. Everything was a little bit tired, shower head kept falling off the wall and spinning all around the bathroom, soaking everything in sight, towells were almost see through, no soap or other accessories. I have found better in 2 star hotels. The location is not in the least bit handy. It says 10mins from the main shopping area, but 1 hour later we finally hit the main shops (Zara). Overall not good value for money, but as a 2.5 or at most 3 star it would be fine.

Reviews.Title: “Really Good”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Century Park Hotel for 4 days and really enjoyed our stay. When we first arrived, we asked for a double room, but wasn't too happy with the layout since two single beds were placed together. But they were more than happy to change to room. Rooms were kept clean, mini bar available, bathroom very clean. Staff was really nice and helpful and the breakfast was satisfying

Reviews.Title: “Safe, quiet, clean”
Reviews.Author: Lukehead
Reviews.Content: Don't let the forst reviewer put you off! Small hotel in a residential area. View is of three small apartment buildings, one Art Deco, one Art Nouveau, one modern, across the street - charming and you can peek in the windows. Hotel is currently being renovated so there is some noise but not enough to interfere with a pleasant stay. Small but well arragnged room. Again, another great Spanish marble bathroom with big towels and good water pressure. There was a growing wet spot in the carpeting, under the window desk counter that gave the room a slightly mouldy smell. We credited it to the renovation work and constant rain of the last week because the room was immacuately clean otherwise. We reported it to the front desk and they seemed surprised and concerned. When we returned that evening, while it was still there, it was apparant they had been working on correcting. Small breakfast rooms ( temporary I think during renovation) but very nice/ample seelction of breads, pastries, juice, fresh fruit, coffees/tea, yoghurt, cheese, meats and wonderful sesame seed whole wheat rolls. Metro stops 3/4 blocks in any direction. Barcelona is a beautiful city!

Reviews.Title: “u gotta go!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I had booked Century Park hotel before i saw this website and when i read the previous review i was a bit scared. However, I m here writing this so that no one goes there with the same impression that i did/ Its a lovely hotel - nice ppl, they speak great english - they have great food and i have never been in a cleaner hotel room. Just wanted to let you know and set things straight! My holiday was great and the hotel was one of the leading factors. Thank you Century Park!

Reviews.Title: “terrible!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: my advice is: do not stay at century park! somebody in the hotel stole all my money (200)while i wasn't there. choose another hotel!!!! bea
